dict.acceptation: 擦，刮；擦痛，擦伤；在…处搔痒；抓破；
发出刮擦声；擦红，擦伤；搔痒；抓，扒；
擦，刮；刮擦声；搔痕；乱写乱画；
打草稿用的，随便写用的；碰巧的，侥幸的；东拼西凑的；平等比赛的；

sent.orig: The second form is reciprocal altruism, or "you scratch my back and I'll scratch yours"
sent.trans: 另一种形式则是互惠型的利他行为，或称为“狼狈为奸，唯利是图”

sent.orig: Scratch me and I will scratch you.
Normally, biologists explainthis as being either nepotism or you-scratch-my-back-and-I'll-scratch-yours.
sent.trans: 生物学家一般用裙带关系或者互帮互助来解释。

sent.orig: You scratch my hack and I'll scratch yours.
sent.trans: 你替我搔背，我也就替你搔背（互相捧场）。

sent.orig: For Scratch label, please scratch the surface layer gently, and the digit code can be seen.
sent.trans: 如果是刮开式标签，请您轻轻的刮开涂层，即可看到数码。
